information.name: Date Calendar with Calendar Auto function
information.description: Uses the Calendar Auto DAX function to generate a data calendar.
author: Mike Carlo

mappings.description: Create the name of the produced Date Table (click to modify)

mappings.defaultValue: The Date table using the Calendar Auto dax function.
mappings.description: Add a description for this measure. (click to modify)

encoding.expression:
GENERATE (
    CALENDARAUTO(),
    VAR currentDay = [Date]
    VAR day = DAY( currentDay )
    VAR month =  MONTH ( currentDay )
    VAR year =  YEAR ( currentDay )
    RETURN
        ROW ( 
            "day", day,
            "month", month,
            "year", year 
        )
)

instructions: Chose a name for your measure clicking on 'Measure name'
Click on 'Create / update' button to create a measure in your model
Click on 'Debug' button to start a debug session with DAX debugger
